website_summaries.verdict: There is a lot to appreciate about the Stowabike, ranging from its 90% pre-assembled state, solid design, easy handling, and quick-folding system, and it is one of the most affordable folding mountain bikes out there.
pros: Steel frame neatly folds in half
Dual suspension delivers a smooth ride
cons: Although anyone can speedily fold a Stowabike in half, it would have been nice if this bike was a little lighter

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: These will not make you Armstrong fast or cool. However, if you don't have a lot of space they are amazing. So ride once or twice, fold it, store it, look at it everyday and say to yourself tomorrow I'll ride it and walk away...at least you saved space. Awesome bike...not so much the gears. But you get what you pay for...and only use twice. Take my money!
customer_reviews.author: JJMel

customer_reviews.title: the gears don’t turn very easily and the hardware the bike comes with is horrible ...
customer_reviews.text: Seat is extremely uncomfortable and high... the gears don’t turn very easily and the hardware the bike comes with is horrible cheap. The weld job is sad and sloppy... Unfortunately we are returning this and spending money elsewhere. It also is very hard to “stow” takes two people to push it together...
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: If you can spring for a professional to assemble the bike, you might want to.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike, let me say that upfront. The problem I have with it is that when I receive the bike the instructions were not complete. I was able to muddle through and get it fixed, but to me not having complete instructions for assembly is a glaring oversight. Even more glaring was the fact that the bicycle in the pictures was not representative of the bicycle that I had bought. When I contacted the manufacturers customer service line, to their credit they noticed the same discrepancy and promised that they would address the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Harden

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed

If I had to do over again, I'd just suck it up and buy a quality, non-folding bicycle. Customer service was nice and helpful though, I'll give them that.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bike with problems

The bicycle's weight is about 40 pounds... perhaps a little heavy for some people to lift into their vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for Price

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your dollar and arrived ahead of time.

The bike itself looks decent and very reasonable for the price. Stylish and has everything you need to get going. Came with tools to assemble bike too! Only thing I needed was the air pump. Hopefully this bike gives us another 15 yrs. since we don’t really beat on our bikes. Just minor bike trails. Looks durable enough.
